column2: mneuville22, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: My Dr prescribed this for my scalp psoriasis and it helps to control some of the flaking and itching, but not all of it. It doesn't seem to matter if I use if for days in a row it doesn't go away and when you stop for a couple of days it comes back. Also, trying to sleep with a shower cap on everynight is not comfortable and it takes 2 or 3 shampoos to get it all out of your hair in the morning. I'd really like to find a better solution. He gave me a shampoo to use, we'll see how that works.

column2: Mindy, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver)
column9: We use for our 2 1/2 yr old.  While I would prefer to find the source of the problem for her eczema vs. slapping on medication, I have to say that this has worked very well for her.
